body_html:
I noticed that this issue is closed and the problem should be fixed, however, I encountered the same poblem today when trying to build tensorflow serving, and the solution is set environment variables before running configure. The environment variable is:
PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH
which sholud be set to where Python.h resides.

body:
I noticed that this issue is closed and the problem should be fixed, however, I encountered the same poblem today when trying to build tensorflow serving, and  the solution is set environment variables before running configure. The environment variable is:
PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH
which sholud be set to where Python.h resides.
